title: Samsung Galaxy S22 and S22+ go official with smaller displays starting at $799
content:
The best-selling flagship Android smartphones are back for another round, with the Samsung Galaxy S22 and Galaxy S22+ offering minor upgrades from the year before at the same price points. Here’s what’s new.

more…

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 and S22+ go official with smaller displays starting at $799 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has officially announced the Galaxy S22 series. Here's where you can buy it, how much it costs, and what it brings to the table.
